gpu-automations.title: GPU Automations
gpu-automations.description: Here you can automate the power limits of your GPU, to save on electricity while you are asleep.

disabled.initializing: GPU Automations are currently still initializing...
disabled.disabled:
Oyasumi allows you to automatically tweak the power limits of your GPU.
This way you can save on your electricity usage while you're asleep.

GPU Automations are currently only available for NVIDIA GPUs.
AMD and Intel GPUs are still unsupported.
disabled.noElevation: For Oyasumi to be able to control the power limits of your GPU, it requires administrator privileges. Please click the button below to restart Oyasumi with the required permissions.
disabled.driverNotLoaded:
Oyasumi did not detect a loaded NVIDIA driver.

Please ensure your system has a NVIDIA card and the appropriate drivers for it installed.
disabled.noDevices:
No graphics cards could be found in your system.

Please ensure your system has a NVIDIA card and the appropriate drivers for it installed.
disabled.unknown: An unknown error occurred trying to enable the GPU automations feature.

gpu-automations.enableWarning:
This is a feature for advanced users!
Incorrectly configuring your power limits could lead to your system becoming unstable.
Please keep this in mind and ideally only use this if you know what you are doing.
gpu-automations.selectGPU: Select the GPU you wish to set the power limit for:
gpu-automations.gpuPowerLimitsUnsupported: The selected GPU does not support setting power limits.

activatingSleepMode.title: When I go to sleep
activatingSleepMode.description: Specify the power limit to set when sleep mode activates:

deactivatingSleepMode.title: When I wake up
deactivatingSleepMode.description: Specify the power limit to set when sleep mode deactivates:

gpu-automations.enabledWarning: Please be aware that setting your power limits too low could result in your system becoming unstable. Disable this feature if you do not know what you are doing.
gpu-automations.inputDefault: Reset to the GPU's default limit.

lighthouseConsole.title: Lighthouse Console
lighthouseConsole.description:
Oyasumi needs to know about the location of your SteamVR installation's lighthouse_console.exe.
If Oyasumi cannot find it in the default location, you need to set where it can be found.

status.NOT_FOUND: The lighthouse_console.exe could not be found at this location.
status.INVALID_EXECUTABLE: The lighthouse_console.exe at this location could not be verified as working.
status.PERMISSION_DENIED: Oyasumi does not have permission to run the lighthouse_console.exe at this location. Try running Oyasumi as administrator.
status.INVALID_FILENAME: The set location is not a valid file path.
status.UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unknown error occurred while trying to look for lighthouse_console.exe at this location.
status.SUCCESS: lighthouse_console.exe has been found and is working correctly!

debug.description: On this page you can find some debug tools. You should not need these, but especially with Oyasumi still being in early testing, they're here if you need them.

persistentStorage.title: Persistent Storage
